Headline: #80 Irving Park Temporary Reroute at Irving Park
ShortDescription: 80 Irving Park buses temporarily rerouted via Irving Park, Oak Park, Forest Preserve Drive, Narragansett & Irving Park, due to street blockage near Irving Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#80 Irving Park buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Irving Park, Oak Park, Forest Preserve Drive, Narragansett, then resume their normal route at Irving Park, due to street blockage near Irving Park.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Harlem (O'Hare Branch)
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Harlem due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Harlem due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
